step.name: RACF-USERADD
step.title: RACF Add User
step.description:
This step will create a new RACF user.


This workflow requires the following input from the user:
  • RACF UserID
  • RACF User Name
  • RACF Password
  • RACF Group
If you have any questions please reach out to Eduardo Rocha:
Eduardo Rocha @IBM
Eduardo @LinkedIn
step.instructions: This step can be used interactively or be triggered from a service userID.
